results.content: Poderia ser mais abrangente, mesmo que seja um curso para iniciantes tanto no desenvolvimento web quanto no GatsbyJS.

results.content: Es un curso un poco pobre en contenido y en duración.

results.content: Very good guide, but needs more real-world scenarios. Pretty happy with the results.
results.content_html: Very good guide, but needs more real-world scenarios. Pretty happy with the results.

results.content: 7/2019: good info, but hopefully the instructor will add a section on how to pull data from Wordpress.
results.content_html: 7/2019: good info, but hopefully the instructor will add a section on how to pull data from Wordpress.

results.content: The video topics were explained thoroughly, however the course will require the learner to at least have some basic understanding of Reac and ES6t as well. If you do not know anything about it, you might get confused. The series were actually good considering it is a free course. I learned a lot about Gatsby in that amount of time.
results.content_html: The video topics were explained thoroughly, however the course will require the learner to at least have some basic understanding of Reac and ES6t as well. If you do not know anything about it, you might get confused. The series were actually good considering it is a free course. I learned a lot about Gatsby in that amount of time.
